title: Roughnecks: the story of oil drillers
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Tom Daly and Guy L. Cote
brief_description: The work of an oil-drilling crew. Tells the tale of tough roustabouts who bulldoze a wilderness in a push for liquid wealth. (Awards: Six including Turin; San Francisco)
